DIA_Finja_Hello_fukoff_16_01: What do you think you're doing? To think I wanted to give you my soup... Get out of my sight!
DIA_Finja_Hello_what_16_01: Don't you see what a mess this place is? I can't clean it all up by myself!
DIA_Finja_Hello_what_16_02: And there is still dinner to prepare and field to look after.
DIA_Finja_Hello_what_16_03: You seem like a hard-working guy, don't you want to earn some extra money?
DIA_Finja_Hello_depends_15_00: You know, it depends on what you mean.
DIA_Finja_Hello_depends_16_01: I mean, I need a man to help me with the housework.
DIA_Finja_Hello_idontknow_15_00: I can try, but I don't know much about cooking or farming.
DIA_Finja_Hello_idontknow_16_01: I wouldn't give you such important tasks.
DIA_Finja_Hello_idontknow_16_02: Just pick up a broom and do a little sweeping around here.
DIA_Finja_Hello_idontknow_16_03: You don't need any special skills to do this, you can certainly do it, and it will help me a lot too.
DIA_Finja_Hello_idontknow_16_04: As compensation, I can treat you to my soup, made with vegetables from my field.
DIA_Finja_Hello_idontknow_16_05: Or, if you're picky about food, there will be some gold coins for you.
DIA_Finja_Hello_idontknow_16_06: What's it gonna be, you gonna help me?
DIA_Finja_Hello_notime_15_01: I don't have time right now.
DIA_Finja_Hello_notime_16_02: I understand that chasing around with a broom may not be the dream job for a youngster, but remember, you have to start somewhere.
DIA_Finja_Hello_notime_16_03: If you get too picky, you'll never accomplish anything.
DIA_Finja_Hello_notime_16_04: Now, if you're not going to help me, then at least don't bother, with all this chatter I'm sure I won't have time to do everything...
DIA_Finja_Hello_illhelp_15_01: I'd be happy to help you.
DIA_Finja_Hello_illhelp_16_02: Oh thank you! I knew this soup would win you over!
DIA_Finja_Hello_illhelp_16_03: Here, have a broom, walk around the house and sweep it thoroughly.
DIA_Finja_Sweeped_16_01: Ooo... I see you're done. The cottage looks better already!
DIA_Finja_Sweeped_16_02: I hope you're not too tired. The soup's just cooked, so you can eat it after work.
DIA_Finja_Sweeped_thanks_15_01: I can't wait to try it.
DIA_Finja_Sweeped_thanks_16_03: Just don't burn yourself, it's still hot.
DIA_Finja_Sweeped_money_15_01: The soup smells delicious, but I could use the gold more.
DIA_Finja_Sweeped_money_16_02: Ahh yes... Well, a few gold coins will certainly help you more than my soup.
DIA_Finja_Sweeped_money_16_03: Here's your payment, just don't drink it all!
DIA_Finja_Sweeped_money_16_04: Now, if you're not going to help me, then at least don't bother, with all this chatter I'm sure I won't have time to do everything...
DIA_Finja_Broom_16_02: The floor may be shiny now, but I have to keep it that way with something.
DIA_Finja_Broom_16_03: Could you give it back to me?
DIA_Finja_Broom_hereugo_16_02: Great, thank you again for your help.
DIA_Finja_Broom_ilostit_15_01: Unfortunately, I must have lost it somewhere.
DIA_Finja_Broom_ilostit_16_02: Lost it? You just swept it up here. How could you lose it?
DIA_Finja_Broom_ilostit_16_03: It was already old anyway, at least my husband will have to buy me a new one now.
DIA_Finja_Broom_ilostit_16_04: But if by some miracle he wanted to ask you about it, remember that you were the one who lost it!
DIA_Finja_Ambient_13_01: Life goes on somehow. From work, to cooking, to sleeping. And so on and so forth.
DIA_Finja_Ambient_13_02: Thanks to your help, I was able to get some rest. I definitely needed it!
